params.chainAmounts: Array of amounts for each participating chain
params.participatingChains: Array of chain names that will participate

execute(bytes32,string,string,bytes).details: This function ensures the call is approved by Axelar Gateway before execution. It uses a hash of the payload for validation and internally calls _execute for the actual command execution. Reverts if the validation fails.

params.commandId: The unique identifier of the cross-chain message being executed.
params.payload: The payload of the message payload.
params.sourceAddress: The address on the source chain that sent the message.
params.sourceChain: The name of the source chain from which the message originated.

executeWithToken(bytes32,string,string,b.details: This function ensures the call is approved by Axelar Gateway With Token before execution. It uses a hash of the payload for validation and calls _executeWithToken for the actual command execution. Reverts if the validation fails.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred.
params.commandId: The unique identifier of the cross-chain message being executed.
params.payload: The payload of the message payload.
params.sourceAddress: The address on the source chain that sent the message.
params.sourceChain: The name of the source chain from which the message originated.
params.tokenSymbol: The symbol of the token to be transferred.

getPendingPayments(bytes32).details: Get pending payments for a bill

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendTokenCrossChain(bytes32,string,addre.details: Send tokens cross-chain for bill payment

setTrustedRemote(string,address).details: Set trusted remote contract for a chain

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

execute(bytes32,string,string,bytes).notice: Executes the cross-chain command after validating it with the Axelar Gateway.

executeWithToken(bytes32,string,string,b.notice: Executes the cross-chain command with token transfer after validating it with the Axelar Gateway.

gateway().notice: Returns the address of the AxelarGateway contract.
